# Changelog

## v1.1.0 2019-05-08

* Typings for Typescript.

## v1.0.3 2018-05-24

* Compatible with Node v10.4.0.
* Rethrow the error if it exists to avoid swallowing it.

## v1.0.2 2018-05-24

* Tweak tags in `package.json`.

## v1.0.1 2018-05-24

* Package renamed to `stream.pipeline-shim`.

## v1.0.0 2018-05-18

* Initial release
